    • dropTableIfExists

      public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Boolean> dropTableIfExists(String tableName)
      Drops table and returns true if result indicates table state changed to DROPPED or DROPPING. Uses NosqlDbFactory.getTableReqTimeout() and NosqlDbFactory.getTableReqPollInterval() to check the result.
      Specified by:
      dropTableIfExists in interface ReactiveNosqlOperations
